website_summaries.verdict: You can't go wrong with these socks, if you need pairs that look great with office wear but can just as easily be worn with boots.
pros: Polyester-blend material with a cable-knit design make these socks suitable for wearing in colder temperatures
cons: Long length may actually fit over the knee for shorter customers
Price is on the high side for three pairs of socks

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best socks I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: (And I'm 53 so I've had many years of sock-wearing time.) Thank God I finally found that I ordered these from smile.amazon.com! I wanted to buy more because they are very comfortable and not itchy to me (eczema and psoriasis). They don't get stretched out of shape and fit great (I wear a 10B).
customer_reviews.author: C. Alex Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Soft and sturdy boot socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are just what my daughter wanted for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Best boot socks ever
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a pair of boot socks years ago that I lost in the wash. These are not effect replacement. Soft. Tall. Look woven but not rough. So pleased
customer_reviews.author: Momtotomboys

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They are nice, but I was expecting a thicker sock. Still nice with a pair of boots to show some of the sock
customer_reviews.author: Gina Marie Nickens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I am tall and they actually come to my knees which is wonderful! Soft and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like Muk luk anything very warm and the stay up
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, especially for big calves
customer_reviews.text: Wear these around the house cause my feel get cold. They are soo comfortable and I love that they are knee high. Plus I have bigger calves and they for comfortably and not tight. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: The knee socks are soft, perfect fit, and wash very well. Not too thick or thin. Perfect for wearing boots or sneakers
customer_reviews.author: April G.

customer_reviews.title: love em
customer_reviews.text: could be a little thicker but overall they are comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made wore for 2 hours didn't even walk much and the toes on the socks ripped apart at seam.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The socks I received have rainbow dots on them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Candelieri

product_meta.title: MUK LUKS Women's 3 Pair Pack Cable Knee High Socks - Basic
product_meta.description: So soft and comfy, Muk Luks women's cable knee high socks' feature darling cable stitching and tall style for a fashionable addition to your fall and winter outfits.
